grade_comment:
Grade: 90

Comment: The response accurately summarizes the main responsibilities of the Sadducees in taking care of the temple complex and performing priestly duties. It also touches on the historical context of religious leadership during the time of Jesus by mentioning the Temple system and the decline of the Sadducees after the destruction of the Second Temple. However, it could have delved deeper into the religious and political significance of the Sadducees within the Jewish society of that time to provide a more comprehensive understanding.
